languages.text: Разговор о прошлом корабля стоит начать со старших офицеров мостика.
The senior officers would be the first logical source of information about the ship's past.
languages.original_text: Разговор о прошлом корабля стоит начать со старших офицеров мостика.

traits.locale_text: The senior officers would be the first logical source of information about the ship's past.
The senior officers would be the first logical source of information about the ship's past.
The senior officers would be the first logical source of information about the ship's past.
The senior officers would be the first logical source of information about the ship's past.
The senior officers would be the first logical source of information about the ship's past.

languages.text: 如果想要了解这艘舰船的过去，高阶军官应该是合乎逻辑的情报源。
languages.original_text: The senior officers would be the first logical source of information about the ship's past.

traits.locale_text: 如果想要了解这艘舰船的过去，高阶军官应该是合乎逻辑的情报源。

languages.text: Die leitenden Offiziere wären die erste logische Quelle, was Informationen über die Vergangenheit des Schiffs angeht.
languages.original_text: The senior officers would be the first logical source of information about the ship's past.

traits.locale_text: Die leitenden Offiziere wären die erste logische Quelle, was Informationen über die Vergangenheit des Schiffs angeht.

languages.text: En toute logique, les officiers supérieurs doivent être ceux qui en savent le plus sur l'histoire du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: The senior officers would be the first logical source of information about the ship's past.

traits.locale_text: En toute logique, les officiers supérieurs doivent être ceux qui en savent le plus sur l'histoire du vaisseau.

languages.text: Los oficiales superiores serían una buena primera parada para investigar el pasado de la nave.
languages.original_text: The senior officers would be the first logical source of information about the ship's past.

traits.locale_text: Los oficiales superiores serían una buena primera parada para investigar el pasado de la nave.

languages.text: 上級士官たちは、船の過去に関する第一の論理的な情報源となるだろう。
languages.original_text: The senior officers would be the first logical source of information about the ship's past.

traits.locale_text: 上級士官たちは、船の過去に関する第一の論理的な情報源となるだろう。

languages.text: Geminin geçmişi hakkında bilgiye sahip olabilecek ilk güvenilir kaynak, kıdemli subaylar olacaktır.
languages.original_text: The senior officers would be the first logical source of information about the ship's past.
